website_summaries.verdict: A highly detailed model with a number of helpful resources included.
pros: Model comes on a convenient wheeled stand
Detailed instructions for quick and easy assembly
Comes with 189 sticker labels and a full-color study guide
Made from quality, durable PVC plastic
cons: Included stickers tend to fall off

customer_reviews.title: It's a good skeleton anatomically but not biomechanically
customer_reviews.text: It's a good skeleton anatomically but not biomechanically. The shoulders and hips don't move well. The head never stays on straight. I'm a PT and yoga teacher so it helps to be able to move the limbs around. It works for the most part. If you need appendages that move easily, you may have to spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Powney

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: This model is more expensive than most but you get what you pay for on this. It is very durable and includes most features typically seen on the skeletal system. I was surprised as it even included the minor foramens and lines that most other models neglect to have. This is not only a great learning tool but and awesome office model. The skull detaches for closer instruction as well. The wheels are a little cheep but it allows you to roll it smoothly over hard wood floors. Overall five stars and highly recommend for the student or professional!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife while she's studying medicine. She absolutely loves it. We've named him Jeffrey and speak as him with a fancy English accent. Decorating him according to the season has become an unexpected source of joy as well. Pro tip: The little paper stickers with the numbers on them tend to fall off after a while and stick to the hardwood. Recommend not using them unless specifically for studying.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS TERRIFIC! It has everything that I was looking for! Did a lot of research before hand. It looks well made, feels like heavy duty, durable materials. I also like that it is made in the United States. Was extremely easy to assemble. I was concerned with the exterior box when it arrived. Holes were punctured on both ends, with one of the poles sticking out approximately 2 inches, still covered in bubble wrap. The box was standing on end instead of flat, as indicated on the box. None of the pieces were damaged. I am looking forward to labeling it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It came today, and I am so excited! My daughter named him Felix, and he was very easy to put together. As far as I can tell, the bones are very detailed and accurate, and I am looking forward to using him to help me study for my Radiography classes. Oh, and I love the "secret gifts" that came with him!
customer_reviews.author: CG1001

customer_reviews.title: The Axis Scientific model now comes with a terrific self study guide and numbering guide
customer_reviews.text: This is the most accurate skeleton I have ever seen. It is the same one used in my daughters massage school which is the reason we bought this one. I have another brand purchased from an artist supply store, it doesn't even come close to this quality. The Axis Scientific model now comes with a terrific self study guide and numbering guide. The thought and care put into this guide and the quality of the skeleton make this the BEST deal available for anyone wanting to further their understanding of the human skeleton. I'm definitely going to be purchasing another one after my daughter graduates and takes off with this one.
customer_reviews.author: artfire19

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product & Company
customer_reviews.text: I am a Kinesiology major studying to be a physical therapist, and this anatomical skeleton is amazing! Not only did it help me for my lab finals, it is a great tool and guide to remembering the anatomy of the human body. Super easy to assemble. The product came with a guide to assemble the skeleton, a study and numbering guide (which is amazing and useful), another guide with every bone labeled, and a little bone pen to use! The company even sent me a little note afterwards, thanking me for the purchase and a quick mini study guide of the skeleton (which I keep in my bag). Overall, love the product and would definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Medina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Meet Fred, he's a Great product. I'm a non-combat disabled vet, with Cervical, T spine, and Lumbar spine injuries. I'm also an artist. In the attached photo you see Fred Holding a 3d pen sculpt of HIs own head. Fun stuff, along with learning more about what's going on inside.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee M. Overcast

customer_reviews.title: Physical therapist and PT educator: Hips and forearm do not articulate well
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapist and a PT educator. The ability to move the hips/shoulders and forearm on this model is terrible. I am not able to demonstrate hip flexion. The metal hardware obstructs the motion. ANy attempt to do so is wearing away the plastic of the acetabulum. Don't purchase this if you want to place the model in a seated position or observe anything close to movement at the hip (or forearm).
customer_reviews.author: Jehalv

customer_reviews.title: Broken Hyoid Bone, Lack of Accountability
customer_reviews.text: The hyoid bone is broken. That’s not acceptable. I contacted Axis Scientific who referred me to Amazon (since that is who fulfilled my order). However there isn’t a simple way (that I can see) of how to contact Amazon regarding this order. Any suggestions of how to contact Amazon for a replacement hyoid bone?
customer_reviews.author: BECK

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: All the detail you need to study for an anatomy class. This skeleton has everything needed, plus the skull easily comes apart to study all the bones and areas. Extremely good value for the money. The assembly is a little bit difficult if you don’t have tiny fingers, but it’s doable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: as a chiropractic student i absolutely love it and find it very helpful, it is very accurate, it is missing minor features, primarily in the skull, but that is ok. I do wish the spine was movable but not a deal breaker! highly recommend if you want it for office decor or even to learn from. (but its easier to learn if its dissasembled)
customer_reviews.author: brinaJ

customer_reviews.title: Warranty worth it- BUT reach out through WEBSITE :)
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Love it- very accurate and helpful especially for visual learners! Customer service was sup-par though amazon BUT the company itself was so helpful. I reached out after a rib broke through their website and the company got back to me very promptly and were very helpful in sending a replacement skeleton.
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: Missing 2 bolts. Otherwise perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It "HE" arrived this morning and I was able to assemble it very quickly. I love it!!!! The only problem that I have is that there were 2 free floating nuts in the box, and it was missing 2 bolts all together (seen in picture). When I was getting ready to put it together I noticed the missing pieces, however worked on it anyway. It turns out the instructions say NOTHING about using the nuts and bolts. I WOULD REALLY LIKE TO HAVE THE 2 BOLTS SENT TO ME REGARDLESS (I'm sure that they have a purpose). If not missing those, this would get a 5 star out of 5 review.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13 year old daughter who is interested in the chiropractic field. Easy to put together & the study guide is easy to identify all the bones. I thought something was wrong with it & customer service was very nice & willing to help. Ended up nothing was wrong, but I was very impressed with them making sure everything was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Find for Anyone Learning Anatomy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my spouse needed for enhancing her studying for a radiography degree! Very detailed, great supplemental materials, good price for the quality you receive. I have no doubt my daughter will also be learning from this years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Reidco

customer_reviews.title: He's a leaner.  But functions
customer_reviews.text: I just started massage school . I use him for boney land marks and muscle origins and insertions. He's very helpful The only con is his lean . His spine leans pretty bad since I got him . No ones spine is perfect but for $200 I was hoping his was.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping phreak

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present and finally took it out of the box as I’m just now starting anatomy class. I wish I would of check it out before cause the skull won’t align properly as it looks like it’s missing a bracket
customer_reviews.author: MaryEllen

customer_reviews.title: Great for reference but wish it was more flexible and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for reference but wish it was more flexible and had accurate rotation of the joints. Otherwise, it seems pretty accurate, it helped me with many of my classes so far
customer_reviews.author: Quincy H.

customer_reviews.title: The skeleton is wonderful! My family has affectionately named him CJ
customer_reviews.text: The skeleton is wonderful! My family has affectionately named him CJ. He is a great study guide and is definitely what i expected. When I received CJ his skull cap was broken but i contacted the company and the next morning they emailed me back and requested pictures. I galdly sent in the pictures and within one week i had a new skull cap for CJ. I am super impressed with the company and how quickly they got back to me and made the situation right.
customer_reviews.author: Uinta

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked out great.
customer_reviews.text: The Scientific Human Skeleton is a very good teaching tool. I had a small defect in the stand and customer service sent me a new part quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have a hands on study experience at home. I'm a nursing student and it has helped my studies at home.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Carter

customer_reviews.title: Homework helper
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It is so detailed and it comes apart so student can examine all the bones. The skull is awsome bc it comes off and apart. It's held together by magnets. Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa sahli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skeleton to help me through PA school. To my knowledge, it is anatomically correct. You can see most of the landmarks on each bone, which is helpful for visualizing muscle origins and insertions. I love that it includes cervical nerves, vertebral arteries, and a hyoid bone! Would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: cassmangan

customer_reviews.title: Great skeleton
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely purchase from this company again. The skeleton exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: KMFP

customer_reviews.title: Great showpiece in a clinical setting AND education tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing has 189 of 206 bones in the human body. The accompanying guide is precious! Great quick reference on various bones.
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav Bawa

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my skeletal model. Perfect for studying anatomy . Only downfall , it was missing some screws for the attachment of the acetabelum to the hip socket. Overall good quality, very detailed. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice skeleton for classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice skeleton for classroom use. I wish the hip joints were attached in a way that showed the actual movement that joint is capable of, the legs seemed to twist oddly at times. The plastic is durable and detailed, and the fingers are pose-able, which has positives and negatives in a classroom setting.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!!! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is just a quick update from my first review regarding a broken skeleton. Well, I am very pleased to say that I received a replacement skeleton from the company. They were prompt in contacting me and sending a new skeleton, no questions asked! I am very busy with school and work but I wanted to say that I am pleased with the quality of my new skeleton!! It is a very helpful resource to have during my studies.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Miller

customer_reviews.title: It was as advertised. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I have no likes or dislikes. It was exactly what I ordered and that is all I require.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: My skeleton came in great condition, however, the study guide and landmark stickers we not included.
customer_reviews.author: HollyDolly

customer_reviews.title: Useful for pictures
customer_reviews.text: I use this skeleton for taking pictures of bones to teach online Anatomy. It has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Brent A. Core

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice accurate skeleton for my daughter in DPT school.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed at the price of this tool- detailed
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at the price of this tool- detailed, explanatory tactile and visual information readily available to us for a couple hundred bucks. Assembled easily, travels well, and....kids love it at parties.
customer_reviews.author: Zimley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Anatomy Students
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing is unbelievable! Definitely a must for students in Anatomy and Physiology!! Great study tool for the best price I could find!
customer_reviews.author: Haley J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: This is the best skeleton model you can get!
customer_reviews.text: I love this skeleton. Axis Scientific did an amazing job with it. The skeleton model is very high quality. The packaging was very well done! As you can see from the pictures that I have uploaded, the skeleton model came out amazing! Thank you Axis Scientific for such a high quality skeleton model.
customer_reviews.author: Huy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! This product doubles as a useful tool for studying anatomy and a brilliant item of home decor. The details are impressive and very helpful for learning anatomy, as they make the textbook illustrations so much easier to understand.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching tool
customer_reviews.text: I use my skeleton named Billy Bob Bones to help elementary students learn the name of bones.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good Skeleton Model
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this skeleton. It arrived within a week of purchasing in excellent quality. I was also very happy to receive marking stickers as well as the mini study guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the best skeletons I’ve bought! Includes the Hyoid bone! Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Great detail for learning. Also fun to dress up :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: The skeleton is great! It exceeded my expectations. The study guide is really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Aid
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who is a physical therapy student and she says it's perfect for her studies!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rae Propst

customer_reviews.title: The hip is not very detailed
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked a movable SI-Joint. The rest of the skeleton looks rather good.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Great product would recomend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bought for Halloween and aged it as it comes is to white worked great for my automated skull
customer_reviews.author: Fred S Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made, and just what I needed for anatomy and physiology classes. I’m very please with both the skeleton and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Axis Scientific Human Skeleton Model Anatomy Bundle, 5' 6" Life Size Skeletal System, 206 Bones, Interactive Medical Replica 3 Year Warranty, Study Guide, Adjustable Rolling Stand, and Dust Cover
